page.title: 07The Sea.
page.content: {Fishing and the beach:}Most of the fish caught is cod,haddock,halibut or plaice.We occasionaly get seals and whales and sharks have been seen further out to sea .Most of our fishing is done in Norwegian water.We have a large problem with ships getting stuck in the Humber on the sandbanks which are very near the surface.There isn't a speed limit in the sea but you aren't allowed to go to fast when you are coming into dock.At Sutton we have groins or breakerwaters to stop sand drifts.These are placed diagonally across the beach about 13metres apart.We used to have a lot of fish near here but most of them have been killed.
